program.name: libglade
program.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:" ;; *-hpux*) CC="cc -Ae" CFLAGS="+O2 -z +ESlit +Onofltacc +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; *-irix6*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 -O2 \ -OPT:Olimit=0" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-linux*) # override system Xft CPPFLAGS="-I${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_INC}" LDFLAGS="-L${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB}"
CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -msym -readonly_strings" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-solaris2.[89]) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; *-solaris2*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=generic" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; esac
./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CPPFLAGS="${CPPFLAGS+${CPPFLAGS}}" \ CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" LDFLAGS="${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_LIBATK_LIB}:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB}:${SB_VAR_LIBGTK_LIB}:${SB_VAR_LIBPANGO_LIB}:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBXML_LIB} ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" \ PKG_CONFIG_PATH="${SB_VAR_LIBATK_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBGTK_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBPANGO_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBXML_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBTTF_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB}/pkgconfig\ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+:${SB_VAR_LIBICONV_LIB}/pkgconfig}" \ --disable-dependency-tracking --datadir=${_datadir} \ --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}
gmake configure
for _pc in libglade-2.0.pc; do ${SB_PATH_SHTOOL} subst -e "\ s!-L\(\${libdir}\)!-L\1 ${CC_LD_RT}\1!;" ${_pc} done

item.para: Implement support GtkComboBoxEntry, GtkToolItem, GtkToolButton, GtkToggleToolButton, GtkRadioToolButton, and GtkSeparatorToolItem
Add libglade version number to the docs
Fix usage of C++ keyword as an argument name
Allow additional signal parameter for glademm
Support disambiguating msgids by prefixing them with a context string
Register GtkColorButton, GtkComboBox, GtkFileChooser and GtkFontButton types
Fix memory leak and incorrect colour map usage
